Content: I hurt my leg in school today. I must’ve accidentally slammed it against a wall at some point exiting a class or something. I tell my step mother and she consoles me and gives me a cream to treat itNLNLI come back home_ tell my father the exact same lines I told my step mother and he gives me a dirty look_ accuses me of having hurt it by climbing a wall and tells me to not be an idiot next time
Are you kidding me? He went from calm demeanour to outright angry
Just because I hurt my leg
And in a malicious tone as well
Not even playful or consoling
It’s not nice to come home to have your father patronise you for accidentally hurting your leg
I don’t get it
Why is he like this
He then comes down to the bathroom where I was washing my hands and doesn’t even say a word or anything
Just gives me a look
I noped the fuck out_ put the cream on my leg and went to bed before he has a chance to say anything to me
You don’t get it. There’s no talking to him when he’s like that
When he gets in this mood he’s always the one in the right
Only he is ever right
I try to talk to him and he won’t listen
He’s got issues and won’t ever address them because therapy is for crazy people according to him
I swear to god he’s bipolar
Sorry to hear that
I’m just lost
I don’t get it
He was fine and then he wasn’t
Like someone flipped a switch inside him
It pains me
I just want a normal father but no
I had to get the crazy music fanatic
Who’s probably bipolar and has major mental issues but won’t ever talk about it
I want a normal home life but no_ I have to be worried about if he’s coming home in a good mood or not
Or if he’s gonna get in one of his moods and “teach” me music where he expects you to get it first try
I’m not strong
This shit has worn me down mentally
The only time I can forget all that and pretend I’m normal is at school
When it’s constantly every 2-3 days I doubt it
It’s been 5 years now
I ain’t strong
And will probably only ever be when I’m out of this house
He won’t be here tomorrow thank god
I’m free for a day
I can do whatever I want without him patronising me constantly. Nothing bad of course_ literally just taking a walk but he always insists that I stay near the house
Well_ if that’s the case
I’m a complex teenager who has major issues himself and will probably have the sad switch flipped on when he gets home and pretends everything is fine for once
After a wholesome day at school
I don’t care anymore
2 more years
And I’m gone
I’ll get a therapist and talk about my shitty feelings and get these shitty thoughts out of my head
And maybe I can live at peace
I won’t ever resort to drugs
I’ve seen enough crap to go down that rabbit hole
Well
Hopefully one day
I’ll stop feeling these things
And feel something genuine
Can’t take initiative. I’ve tried
I have actually yelled at my father once
To get his shit straight and to stop being like this
Why should he be able to talk shit to me and my brothers but when I do it it’s bad?
Haha oh man
I’m so screwed
Music school yaaay
Can’t wait for another 2 years at something I’m good at but don’t like
Itll be fun
I’ll be the dream my old man never had
I can’t dude
It’s over for me
Might as well just go along with it
Least it pays well
Maybe with someone kinder as my teacher I’ll grow to like it
Because if I take control of my own life I lose my old man. I’ll be dead to him
If I ain’t a musician I’m dead to him
And it’s not like I haven’t tried to improve yeah?
Day after day
Nothing’s changed

I’ve practiced my instrument by myself without my fatherNLNLI’ve been doing more exercise by myself NLNLI’ve been eating healthier NLNLI’ve been going out moreNLNLI’ve interacted with more people at my school and made more friends
I’m telling you_ I’m only ever unhappy at my own house
I have tried
Many times
So many I’ve lost count
But he doesn’t listen
He won’t ever listen and he won’t ever change. He promises change but that’s been a dead promise for 5 years
So what am I supposed to do. My hands are tied
I can’t do anything else
I’m so tired
I just want it to stop
I can’t do this anymore
I can’t keep this farce any longer
I wish I could’ve had a different outcome
I would’ve left him years ago but I can’t leave
My mother
She will be all alone with him and she’ll be so heartbroken
And I love her too much to leave her
He’ll probably take his anger out on her too
I just
Want it to stop and it hasn’t stopped for 6 goddamn years. I thought after I chose him instead of my step mother everything would be over but no
I can’t ever catch a break I always have to have one bullshit after another
Only at school and when I’m by myself in my room
I want to go out and take walks but the old man won’t let me
Haha yeah I wish
He’ll probably have a stroke the second I leave without telling him
I have
On one occasion
I told him everything that I thought of him
Afterwards I felt good
Great even
Then he sent my and my brothers to my room
And we stayed there the whole afternoon
And I just watched the sunset
The orange colours mixing with purple and creating pretty colours in my room
And the shadows too
And for once in my life I felt at peace
And it was sweet
Yeah
I miss it
I miss a lot of things
Oh and younger brothers
I’m the middle child
He’s a french teacher
Finished uni
That’s awesome
French is a very cool language
Comment ca va?
I’m gonna sleep of this now
Maybe tomorrow after a long walk I’ll feel fine again
Sure_ thanks
A listener is a godsend
But because I don’t relate at all with other kids my age
